entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
